title: Gaza aid yet to reach civilians, UN says, as pressure grows on Israel
summary: Israel agreed on Sunday to allow a "basic amount of food" to enter Gaza, where global experts have warned of a looming famine.

title: Canada in talks with US to join Trump's Golden Dome
summary: PM Mark Carney's office says there are "active discussions" on the Golden Dome, but it's too early to say how Canada would join or pay in.

title: Six Ukrainian soldiers killed in Russian strike on training exercise
summary: Ukraine's National Guard said the attack took place while the men were carrying out exercises at a firing range.

title: R&B star Chris Brown freed on Â£5m bail by London court
summary: The US singer is accused of assault at a nightclub in central London in 2023.

title: West Nile virus detected in UK mosquitoes for first time
summary: A UK Health Security Agency spokesperson said the risk to the general public is "very low".

title: Ukrainian ex-top official shot dead outside Madrid school - reports
summary: The man, named by Ukrainian and Spanish sources as Andriy Portnov, had just dropped his children off at the school, reports say.

title: British tourist arrested in Namibia over nude photos of children
summary: The 65-year old Briton is also accused of touching children's private parts while on a holiday in Namibia.

title: Cheers stars pay tribute to 'Norm' actor George Wendt
summary: Kelsey Grammer and Ted Danson pay their respects to their "beloved" co-star from the hit US sitcom.

title: Tropical forests destroyed at fastest recorded rate last year
summary: Tropical forests provide a buffer against climate change, but disappeared faster than ever recorded last year.

title: Former DR Congo PM sentenced to hard labour on corruption charge
summary: Augustin Ponyo Matata is found guilty of his part in embezzling about $245m.
